page.title: 09Longwell Green Housing.
page.content: In our survey of 160 house owners in Longwell Green only 5 people were born here.The rest moved on to the Wimpey Estate 20 years ago or less. One third of the people had moved in over 10 years ago.One third moved in between 5 and 10 years ago.{House prices}range from 25,000 to 63,000 pounds. Most people live in 10 year old or older{semi-detached}houses which have 7 rooms. 63 people had{detached } houses,10 had{bungalows,}8 had {terraced }houses. Gas {central heating was in 103 houses while 120 had a{garage.} The majority of homes were{brick} built, had 2 storeys and both front and back{gardens.}There were many cul-de-sacs on the California Farm Estate.
